name: Blind Spot (itch) (Rhia_a, Kelly Shen, trendywalnut, hexxagon, Lajeeth Thangavel)
name_original: Blind Spot (itch) (Rhia_a, Kelly Shen, trendywalnut, hexxagon, Lajeeth Thangavel)
description:
There's no time to explain and no time to turn around! Drive as fast as you can with the dangerous item in your possession, dodge incoming traffic, and evade the invisi-cops—all in reverse.

Credits

  • Connor - Programming/Design
  • Melody - Design
  • Lajeeth - UI
  • Karina - 3D/2D art
  • Kelly - 2D art
  • Will - Sound design
  • Ash - Writing /VO
